backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Describes two features: replacing background audio in ProposeDayPage and adding a fade‑in effect on playback.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of all frontend source files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color variables, dark mode values, and base styling utilities.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading romantic fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component that renders ProposeDayPage.
frontend/src/components/FinalReveal.tsx: Shows a button that reveals a final romantic message with simple animations.
frontend/src/components/ProposeDayPage.t: Main page component with sections, decorations, and a full audio player with fade‑in, mute, volume, and play/pause logic.
Renders corner roses and animated or static falling petals based on reduced‑motion preference.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Wrapper section that animates into view using the scroll‑reveal hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context and logic using Internet Identity and AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects whether the user prefers reduced motion via a media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for React Query hooks with no backend operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: Provides a hook that reveals elements on scroll using IntersectionObserver, with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom rose-themed OKLCH variables, dark mode tokens, accessibility focus rules, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge to merge class names safely.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, and applies global CSS.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, font settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, design goals, feature descriptions, and known issues for the romantic one-page Propose Day website.
